===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|けだもの|yomi=k}}
Literally "thing of hair". Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=けだもの|毛|tr1=ke|t1=hair|だ|tr2=da|pos2=genitive marker|物|tr3=mono|t3=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> Medial ''-da-'' is a very rare genitive marker found in compounds, also seen in {{m|ja|果物||tr=kudamono|fruit}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|けだもの|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|kyu=獸|けだもの}}

# an animal covered in fur, a beast
#* {{RQ:Konkōmyō Saishōōkyō Ongi|6 (back)}}
#*: 獸 '''ケタモノ'''

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|けもの|yomi=k}}
Literally "hair thing". Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=けもの|毛|tr1=ke|t1=hair|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|けもの|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|kyu=獸|けもの}}

# an animal covered in fur, a beast
